tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE landfill_gas_emissions (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  methane_level DECIMAL,
  carbon_dioxide_level DECIMAL,
  oxygen_level DECIMAL,
  nitrogen_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_gas_emissions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  emission_date DATE,
  methane_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE mitigation_strategies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
  implementation_date DATE,
  effectiveness_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE landfill_gas_emissions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gas_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    emission_level DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE mitigation_strategies (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    cost DECIMAL,
    implementation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE landfill_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE gas_emissions (
  emission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_id INT REFERENCES landfill_sites(site_id),
  emission_date DATE NOT NULL,
  methane_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
  carbon_dioxide_level FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE mitigation_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mitigation_impact (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT REFERENCES mitigation_strategies(strategy_id),
  impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_locations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR,
    address TEXT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
);
